verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] proposed arming teachers . In another industry , aviation , some airline pilots are already armed .
[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: proposed] [ARG1: arming teachers . In another industry , aviation , some airline pilots are already armed] .
President Trump has proposed arming teachers . [ARGM-LOC: In another industry , aviation] , [ARG1: some airline pilots] [V: are] [ARGM-TMP: already] [ARG2: armed] .
